name: Ghenghis Khan
summary: Genghis Kahn is a strategy game that is roughly contemporary to Romance of the Three Kingdoms and Nobunaga's Ambition, but focuses instead on global domination (at least in the old world sense) around the 12th century. The game is loosely centered around Genghis Kahn, who unified the Mongol tribes and then set out to conquer his neighbors.
